page.title: 01NORTHWICH BLOCK
page.content: THIS BLOCK COVERS THE CENTRE OF NORTHWICH TOWN AND ALSO INCLUDES THE AREAS OF WINNINGTON,RUDHEATH AND PARTS OF LEFTWICH.IN STUDYING THIS BLOCK WE LOOKED AT FIVE MAIN AREAS.THE FIRST SECTION LOOKS AT THE LEISURE FACILITIES IN THIS AREA AND INCLUDES SECTIONS ON CLUBS,RECREATION, EVENTS AND ENTERTAINMENT.THE SECOND SECTION LOOKS AT EDUCATION, RELIGION AND THE LIFE STYLE OF A TYPICAL FAMILY.THE INDUSTRY SECTION LOOKS AT EMPLOYMENT,POPULATION AND HEALTH,AS WELL AS INDUSTRY,AND LOOKS AT THE EFFECTS OF INDUSTRY ON THE LANDSCAPE. THE NEXT SECTION LOOKS AT HOUSING, LOCAL HISTORY,THE MEDIA AND HEALTH. THE LAST SECTION LOOKS AT TRANSPORT, COMMUNICATIONS AND TOURISM IN THIS AREA. INFORMATION IN THIS BLOCK INCLUDES OUR OWN SURVEY RESULTS.
